body:
这里有 navigator 的例子： http://weex-project.io/cn/examples.html#module/navigator

信息提供不全，很可能是 URL 地址或者网络原因， issue 先关掉了，如果还有问题请提供更详细的信息。
It works fine for me. http://dotwe.org/vue/539c38f46c2d232009b76e8d6c0ce294
折叠展开这种效果，在前端里就可以实现。
信息不足，issue 先关掉了，如果还有问题，请按照 issue 模板提供更详细的信息。
请提供完整例子和复现步骤。

这个功能可以用独立的模块来实现，Weex SDK 为了保持精简，未必适合内置此功能。

参考：
+ http://weex-project.io/cn/guide/extend-android.html
+ http://weex-project.io/cn/guide/extend-ios.html
很可能与网络库或者服务端接口有关，请提供例子和复现问题的步骤。

@Hanks10100 i mean using border in scroller rather than div
@Hanks10100 PTAL again, thanks.

Thanks for your advice, but I don't think it's a good idea.

Weex is a mixed technology, it contains both Android, iOS, and front-end projects, not just Android. The source codes of them are located in different folders, which is `android`, `ios`, `runtime`, and `weex_core`, they also wrote in different languages. I think it's a good idea to manage them separately, the root path should be reserved for readme, license, build scripts, and other platform-independent files.

For those IDEs, I think we can do more configure things to make them easy to use.

The same with 19.0.0.5 release. I have in build.gradle
```
releaseCompile com.taobao.android:weex_sdk:0.19.0.5:release@aar'
```

And get this error when app starts:
```
11-15 23:15:16.263  1053 12888 D AES     : java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Failed resolution of: Lorg/jacoco/agent/rt/internal_b0d6a23/Offline;
11-15 23:15:16.263  1053 12888 D AES     :      at com.taobao.weex.WXSDKEngine.$jacocoInit(Unknown Source)
11-15 23:15:16.263  1053 12888 D AES     :      at com.taobao.weex.WXSDKEngine.<clinit>(Unknown Source)
11-15 23:15:16.263  1053 12888 D AES     :      at com.taobao.weex.WXSDKEngine.addCustomOptions(Unknown Source)

```

> @myeveryheart 一样，只能用debug版本

release版本还不解决吗？有点急

> 遇到同样的问题 ，求解

@Hanks10100 问题很严重啊，上线不可能用debug包吧，希望尽快解决

Generated by :no_entry_sign: dangerJS

if u need to use border in scroller, you may need add div as scroller's wrapper.
u can see demo here:http://dotwe.org/vue/1b5c2dd85b197ed683b7038db1bef91d

@songxing10000 that's a necessary feature for the weex develop, and we are currently adjusting the code for the playground, and for the manual launch we will also cover this feature on `weex-toolkit@2.x`.

For now, we suggest you using `weex run [ios/android]` command to preview your page on native device, it will support the hot-reload feature.

Also, you can use the weex VSCode extension to do this job, it's easier for you to run the device.

See: https://github.com/weex-cli/vscode-weex.
